sentence.text: Mutations in Ankyrin repeat and sterile alpha motif domain containing 6 (biological_process) play a causative role in renal cyst formation in the PKD/Mhm(cy/+) rat model of polycystic kidney disease and in nephronophthisis in humans.

A network of protein partners of biological_process is emerging and their functional characterization provides important clues to understand the role of ANKS6 in renal biology and in mechanisms involved in the formation of renal cysts.
